alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 7:38PM CST until December 19 at 3:49AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is ongoing. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was near 92.7 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will continue to drop below 92.7 feet and is forecast to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
